Peering into the Void
After completing the Blood Ritual research, you will need to uncover the secrets of Void Artifacts.

The Task
Locate a Rift in your world.
Detonate the rift using Paradoxical Matter or wait for the slim chance (1%) that it collapses naturally.
When the rift collapses, there is a chance it will drop Void Seeds.
The Next Step
Use your Thaumometer to scan the Void Seed.
This will unlock the path to Occult Revelations, allowing you to delve into Forbidden Arts.
Important Notes
Be prepared for the effects of Warp and instability that may arise during this process.
Ensure you have adequate defenses and tools for handling the potential dangers of rift collapses.
The knowledge you gain will open doors to power, but as always with such pursuits, tread carefully.
